Question.Subject: Are free rewards legitimate? Such as "claimfreerewards.com"?
Question.Content: I was just curious about these "free rewards" things and i would like to participate in the website "claimfreerewards.com" to have a possibility of claiming an "Ipad" I thank you all for any Information you can give me
Question.ChosenAnswer: Usually you have to fill out tons of surveys and make purchases to receive coupons, so it's not that it's actually free in a sense of not having to do anything. You'll also notice that you'll get a huge amount of unwanted email. I've had curiosities about sites like this, but all the surveys and pop ups and emails were so annoying that I gave up. If you want free stuff, try entering sweepstakes.

Answer.Content: Usually you have to fill out tons of surveys and make purchases to receive coupons, so it's not that it's actually free in a sense of not having to do anything. You'll also notice that you'll get a huge amount of unwanted email. I've had curiosities about sites like this, but all the surveys and pop ups and emails were so annoying that I gave up. If you want free stuff, try entering sweepstakes.
